Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.io

package gov.sandia.gmp.util.io
  • Class
    Description
    FileAttributes
    Enumerates the six standard queries one might make concerning the accessibility of a File object in Java: EXISTS, IS_FILE, IS_DIRECTORY, READABLE, WRITEABLE, and EXECUTABLE.
    FileStreamSupport
    Defines all file/directory accessibility tests one may wish to perform when reading from or writing to files or folders.
    GlobalInputStreamProvider
    Allows custom InputStream initialization for Files, depending on what context a GMP/SALSA3D application may be running in (e.g.
    GlobalOutputStreamProvider
    Allows custom OutputStream initialization for Files, depending on what context a GMP/SALSA3D application may be running in (e.g.
    InputStreamProvider<D>
    Simple interface that allows for the transformation of different types of objects into InputStreams.
    InputStreamProvider.FileInputStreamProvider
     
    InputStreamProvider.TriConsumer<T1,T2,T3>
     
    OutputStreamProvider<D>
    Simple interface that allows for the transformation of different types of objects into OutputStreams.
    OutputStreamProvider.FileOutputStreamProvider
